home.intro: I'm a Java developer with 4 years of experience
home.description: I specialize in creating backend and frontend applications
about.title: About me
about.aboutMeContent: I am a software developer with four years of experience. During one of my past jobs at a furniture company, I had the opportunity to manage a team of people and to work directly with the client. This is also where I learned firsthand how important it is to satisfy the client. I also enjoyed managing a team and would like to manage an IT team someday. In my current job at Mikronika, I directly coordinate with clients to understand and satisfy their expectations while improving and maintaining the company's software solutions.
about.educationInstitution: Academy of Computer Science and Management „Copernicus" in Wrocław
about.skillsList: Java: Spring MVC, Spring Security, Spring Boot, Play, Hibernate, Maven
Other programming and markup languages: C++, HTML, CSS
Databases: MySQL, Oracle BDMS, SQL queries
German – A2 and I'm still learning...
about.interestsList: Attending youth camps as councilor and winter sports teacher
